ComicInfo.Title: Don't Knock It; A Dark And Bouncy Christmas; Hose Job; Treasure Hunt
ComicInfo.Summary:
Don't Knock It: A female rabbit tries to show her mate why she likes being a submissive.
A Dark And Bouncy Christmas: Magic dust brings a group of toys to life. But one of the toys quickly dominates the others.
Hose Job: The patrol officers hold a car wash to raise funds for charity, with Nikki luring customers to the car wash with her barely legal attire.
Treasure Hunt: Amy and James play a prank on The Mistress.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:26:47. [Issue ID 248487]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Kurt Wilcken,Will Faust,Dennis Clark,Brian Sutton,Matt Broersma
ComicInfo.Inker: Lute Wilcken,Will Faust,Dennis Clark,The Mighty Mole-Cricket,Nebel Ungen
ComicInfo.Letterer: Lute Wilcken,Will Faust,Dennis Clark,The Mighty Mole-Cricket
